snippet: Russia and the United States hope to convene  international talks within a month in order to end the war in Syria.
abstract: Pres Bashar al-Assad’s government gives Russia names of officials who would attend international talks intended to end war in Syria, even as representatives of both sides in Syria publicly express skepticism about prospect of political settlement.
lead_paragraph: Russia and the United States hope to convene  international talks within a month in order to end the war in Syria.

headline.seo: Syria Names Envoys for Peace Talks
headline.main: Syria Gives Russia List of Envoys to Peace Talks
headline.print_headline: Syria Offers List of Envoys For Peace Talks

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
